  • Palette

PaletteÔÉÅ

The palette contains every tool available to the user. To open it, use the trigger on the primary controller.
Some options are available at the top of the palette.
Click the icon to return to the lobby.

Click the icon opens the save and load setting panel.

Click the icon, to play scene animations.

Click the icon to show/hide gizmos in the scene.

Click the icon to show/hide locators in the scene.
The palette can be pinned around the user. To do so, click on the icon, and move the palette to a new position.
The palette position is saved between executions.
